headline: Hershey positions for “lower volume sensitivity” from inflation pricing
summary: Like Mondelez earlier this week, president and CEO Kirk Tanner said pricing was not fully recovered last year from cocoa inflation.

headline: Why Hershey (HSY) Is Up 17.8% After 2025 Profit Drop But Strong 2026 Outlook And Dividend Hike
summary: The Hershey Company has reported full-year 2025 results showing US$11.69 billion in sales and a sharp drop in net income to US$883.26 million, while also recording goodwill impairment charges and declaring its 384th consecutive regular dividend on the common stock. Alongside these results, Hershey issued strong 2026 guidance with higher expected earnings per share, boosted its quarterly dividend, and expanded seasonal product innovation across its confectionery and salty snacks...

headline: The Hershey Company (HSY) Climbs to 52-Week High Ahead of Dividends
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Withstanding Market Turbulence. The Hershey Company (NYSE:HSY) was one of the best performers on Thursday. headline: HSY Q4 Deep Dive: Category Investment and Cocoa Dynamics Shape Recovery Path
summary: Chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7% year on year to $3.09 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.71 per share was 21.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
